ingredients: 250g paneer (cubed), 1/2 cup yogurt, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1/2 tsp turmeric powder, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 onion (cut into large chunks), 1 bell pepper (cut into chunks), 1 tomato (cut into chunks), 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish.
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, and salt.
Add paneer cubes, onion, bell pepper, and tomato to the marinade. Mix well and let it marinate for 1 hour.
Skewer the marinated paneer and vegetables alternately on skewers.
Heat a grill pan or use a barbecue, brush with oil.
And grill the paneer skewers until golden and slightly charred on all sides.
Serve hot, garnished with cilantro and lemon wedges.
